title: If the Illuminati has Quora, what kind of questions would they ask? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rather than actually being interested in the answer (they’re supposedly a group of intellectuals secretly controlling the world, why would they need advise from Quorans?) I think they’d use questions as propaganda. They might post provocatie questions that divide specific groups, in a similar way to how Russia apparently manipulated the US election. They might also ask questions and then flood them with answers that serve their agenda.
